ComicInfo.Title: Battle 2
ComicInfo.Summary:
Second issue with free gift - 30"x20" Poster with details on British Infantry kit and the British armies of World War Two
D-Day DawsonLofty's One-Man LuftwaffeBattle Stations (Editorial and Letters Page)The Flight of the Golden HindeDay of the Eagle (the first Mike Nelson: The Eagle story)Battle Honours: Pegasus Bridge (a two-pager telling events within a specific battle)Boys at War: The 3 Musketeers of Denmark (a one-page "amazing true life-story" in words, with an illustration)Rat PackThe Bootneck BoyThe Terror Behind the Bamboo CurtainThis Amazing War: The Man Who Never Was(non-fiction one-pager)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-12-05 22:15:05. [CVDB247099]
ComicInfo.Characters: Danny Budd, Mike Nelson, Sergeant Steve Dawson
